full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA NAM MKHA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @041B SEMS CAN DAG GI GANG DAG RTZOD 'GYUR BA, DE DAG GIS NI GZHI YI RTZA BA SPONGS, ,MYUR DU MTHONG BAR 'GYUR BA DAG GI Ni, ,RTZA BZHI PO THAMS CAD 'GYUR BAR GYIS, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL BA DANG, DGE SLONG DE DAG DANG, 'KHOR DE THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN RNAMS DGA' STE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL BA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO,, ,,'PHAGS PA NAM MKHA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,, ,,
